717854f-a.text:
154 Broome Street, north west corner of Ridge Street, showing P.SS. 92.
Board of Education,N.Y.C.
1920
Neg.#2371
717854f-a.folder: Broome Street & Ridge Street, Manhattan, NY

717853f-a.text:
(1)
144-134 Broome Street, at and adjoining the N.E. corner of Ridge Street. The view also shows 44-52 Ridge Street, east side, from Broome to but not including the south side of Delancey Street, which is the starting point of the East River Bridge. The building in the foreground is the Seventh Presbyterian Church.
June 12, 1931.   Built in 1838

P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same.
April 1929.
Hotel Hatfield & 7th Pres Ch cor Broome & Ridge Sts
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

717851f-b.text:
Broome Street, north side at Ridge Street, showing mainly the Seventh Presbyterian Church at the N.E. corner. On the
oposite corner (N.W.) is Public School 92.
Two of the views show portions of the latter feature and are in a westward direction. View No. 3 is eastward and eliminates
the school.
May 7, 1939
Views: 1-2-3
756 D2 VIEW 1- NEG. # 3332
756 D2 VIEW 2- NEG. # 3333
756 D2 VIEW 3- NEG. # 3334
P. L. Sperr
717851f-b.folder: Broome Street & Ridge Street, Manhattan, NY

722692f-a.text:
Ridge Street,West side and the south west corner of Broome Street,looking southwards and across Grand St. The Synagogue is located on the east side of Ridge Street at #26.
P.L.Sperr,  May 7th,1939
No reproductions.
722692f-a.folder: Ridge Street & Broome Street, Manhattan, NY

717852f-a.text:
Broome Street,South ^North? East corner of Ridge Street, showing the Ukrainian-Russian-American,All Saints Church. The building said to have been a R.C.Church. Hotel Hatfield is located at #48 Ridge Street.
^Possibly the 8th Presbyt Ch
January 19th,1941.

Beecher Ogden,
Grand Central Terminal.
Credit line Imperative.
NEG # 3335
